Text:
Let us Pray.
Forgive us God Almighty. [t] Through your forgiveness, may we faithfully follow Your only begotten Son down into the grave. [*] May we follow Him through death, and rise again with Him in newness of life, with You who live and reign forever.
Amen.
Changes: 2024-01-18 - Constance McIntosh Smith: Changes to fix grammar issues.
2023-12-09 - Paul Prins: Fix grammar after the mid-point
